Name: Gold Medalion
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Gold by name and golden in colour. Frothy, orange fresh and cognac based.
Nutrition: One serving of Gold Medalion contains 231 calories
